title: Fennel and mushroom tartlets
description: These beautiful delicate fennel tartlets make a gorgeous starter or part of a buffet lunch.
ingredients: 175g/6oz mushrooms, ideally mixed, such as brown caps, shiitake, oysters, trimmed where necessary
1 bulb fennel, cut into 1cm/0.5in slices, blanched and drained.
6 cloves garlic, lightly crushed in their skins
